taxon.author: (Blackwall, 1858)
taxon.distribution: Africa. Introduced to the Caribbeen, South America, Sri Lanka, China, Laos, Philippines, Indonesia, Australia, Pacific islands

referenceObject.reference: Blackwall, J. (1858a). Descriptions of six newly discovered species and characters of a new genus of Araneida. Annals and Magazine of Natural History (3) 1(6): 426-434.
